title: Eco Bloom Skincare
summary: Scaled a mission-led skincare brand with a content and paid strategy that improved conversion quality and reduced CAC.
objective: Increase first-time purchases from paid social while improving ad-to-landing-page message consistency.
strategy: Built a two-tier funnel with awareness and conversion creative.
Aligned organic and paid calendars to promote proven hooks quickly.
Introduced UGC and founder-led video variants for stronger relevance.
execution: Created a weekly creative test matrix.
learnings: Founder credibility and short routine demos outperformed static visuals.
nextSteps: Expand to Pinterest and launch seasonal message tests.

title: PetGlow DTC
summary: Revamped social storytelling and ad structure for a pet wellness startup, lifting retention and new customer volume.
objective: Increase subscription signups by improving post-click trust and reducing friction in offer communication.
strategy: Created segment-specific creative by dog life stage.
Used creator partnerships for social proof.
execution: Rewrote captions for stronger hooks and value stacks.
Launched lookalike tests from high-LTV users.
learnings: Specific testimonial outcomes beat broad claims.
nextSteps: Scale testimonial formats and test regional seasonal promotions.
